documents.document:
The new version 3.9.1 of ApPHP Hotel Site script has bben re

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.co.il/2012/07/new-version-391-of-apphp-hotel-site.html

The new version 3.9.1 of ApPHP Hotel Site script is available now for downloading. There are some bugs fixed and many new additions and improvements.ApPHP Hotel Site is a powerful hotel management and on-line reservation site script. This script is the fully functional PHP solution to manage small to medium size of hotels, holiday flats or guesthouse. Link: http://phpbuilder.blogspot.co.il/2012/07/new-version-391-of-apphp-hotel-site.html

The new version 3.0.2 of ApPHP TreeMenu has been released

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.co.il/2012/07/new-version-302-of-apphp-treemenu-has.html

The new version 3.0.2 of ApPHP TreeMenu is available now for downloading. There are some new additions and improvements in this version: http://www.apphp.com/php-tree-menu/index.php

The new version 3.3.9 of PHP DataForm Pro has been released

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.co.il/2012/08/the-new-version-339-of-php-dataform-pro.html

The new version 3.3.9 of PHP DataForm Pro is available now for downloading. There are many improvements and new features, like new calendar type "dropdownlist", new "view_type" for "color", autocomplete feature for texboxes etc: http://www.apphp.com/php-dataform/index.php

The new version 7.7.7 of ApPHP DataGrid has been released.

http://www.onlywire.com/r/105859590

The new version 7.7.7 of ApPHP DataGrid was released and available now for downloading. There are many improvements and new features. Please read carefully Getting Started.

New version 7.1.5 of DataGrid Pro was released

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2011/11/new-version-715-of-datagrid-pro-was.html

The new version 7.1.5 of PHP DataGrid is available now for downloading. There are many improvements and new features, like working with PDO extension, exporting in XLS, improved styles etc. This version requires full re-installation, if you work with one of previous. Read carefully Getting Started.

Here the main additions and improvements:
* Feature: [added] non-documented attribute for text fields in add/edit modes - "default_null"=>"true"
* Feature: [added] non-documented attribute for image fields in add/edit modes - "resize_dir"=>"down|up|both"
* Feature: [added] on client side check (javascript) for allowed file extensions before uploading
* Feature: [added] possibility to export into xls files: "xls"=>"true"
* Feature: [added] non-documented property: $this->uploadType = "by_one|all"; that defines a type of files/images submission
* Feature: [added] support for PDO extension
* Feature: [improved] set default value "before" for for "sign_place"=>"" attribute of "money" fields
* F

The new version 3.2.1 of JS Auto Form Validator was released

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2011/12/new-version-3.html

The new version 3.2.1 of JS Auto Form Validator Pro is available now for downloading. There are some bugs fixed and also new additions and improvements. The JS Auto Form Validator Pro is an easy-to-setup form validation script which enables you to handle the whole form validation process without writing any JavaScript code.

New version 3.2.6 of ApPHP Tabs was released.

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/01/new-version-326-of-apphp-tabs-was.html

The new version 3.2.6 of ApPHP Tabs Pro (AJAX Enabled) was released and available now for downloading.

The ApPHP Tabs is a simple PHP script that generates multilevel tab menu control which consists of nice-looking tabs. It may be useful for web developers who appreciate their time and do not want to waste it on boring work but instead focus on really challenging tasks. It takes you only few seconds to add or remove a tab. You can use the script to organize your website navigation system. It was written according to object-oriented principles and is very simple to install, implement, use and modify.

New version 3.8.1 of ApPHP MicroCMS was released

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/01/new-version-381-of-apphp-microcms-was.html

We are happy to announce that new update for ApPHP MicroCMS was released and available now for downloading.

PHP MicroCMS (PHP MCMS) is a simple, but very powerful Content Management System that everyone can use. This script can be installed easily by web developers, webmasters, graphic designers, etc. PHP MCMS was developed in OOP and allows you to build websites in a few minutes and then easy add and edit the content.

The new version 2.3.2 of ApPHP DataGrid Wizard was released.

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/02/new-version-232-of-apphp-datagrid.html

The new version 2.3.2 of ApPHP DataGrid Wizard is available for downloading. ApPHP DataGrid Wizard - utility script for generating PHP DataGrid pages. ApPHP DataGrid Wizard allows you easy creation of DataGrid pages. This operation does not require specific technical or programming knowledge. All you need is to select a table, fields for the table, define the data type for each field and choose any other setting you need... In a few seconds you will get page with powerful and fully functional DataGrid component.

The new version 2.3.0 of ApPHP Business directory was releas

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/03/new-version-230-of-apphp-business.html

he new version 2.3.0 of ApPHP Business Directory is available for downloading. ApPHP Business Directory is a simple, but powerful Business Directory solution. This script allows to add categories, then associate added businesses to these categories. You may also add business profiles including basic business contact info, business description, website link, e-mail contact, categories, map links etc.

New version 7.4.9 of ApPHP DataGrid was released

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/03/new-version-749-of-apphp-datagrid-was.html

The new version 7.4.9 of ApPHP DataGrid was released and available now for downloading. There are many improvements and new features. This version requires full re-installation, if you work with one of previous.

New product ApPHP Medical Appointment was released

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/03/new-product-apphp-medical-appointment.html

ApPHP Medical Appointment is online doctor, therapist appointment and medical clinic site PHP script. This Appointment System is an application for handling doctors appointments. It enables patients to book an appointment using web-based interface, and administrator of the clinic is able to approve/reject the appointment.

New version 2.1.2 of ApPHP AJAX File Uploader was released.

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/04/new-version-212-of-apphp-ajax-file.html

The new version 2.1.2 of ApPHP AJAX File Uploader was released and available now for downloading. There are some improvement new features and improvements. This version requires full re-installation, if you work with one of previous. Please read carefully our Installation Guide and Getting Started: http://www.apphp.com/php-medical-appointment/index.php ApPHP AJAX File Uploader is an easy to use, high-performance PHP AJAX Multiple File Upload Control which allows you to upload files to web server without refreshing the page.

New product ApPHP DataValidator has been released

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/04/new-product-apphp-datavalidator-has.html

ApPHP DataValidator is a simple lightweight tool useful for primary general data checks. It handles numbers, strings, emails, URLs. A range of parameters is provided for a wide variety of different verifications. All parameters are used optionally and could be switched on and off for every specific value. Link: http://www.apphp.com/php-datavalidator/index.php

New version 3.5.7 of ApPHP Calendar has been released.

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/05/new-version-357-of-apphp-calendar-has.html

The new version 3.5.7 of ApPHP Calendar Pro is available now for downloading. There are some bugs fixed and also many additions and improvements. This version allows new installation or updating, if you work with one of previous. The ApPHP Calendar is a powerful PHP calendar script that may be easily integrated and used with various PHP projects, such as schedulers, event processors etc. The calendar is very simple to install, implement and use. ApPHP Calendar has a user-friendly interface and navigation. It can be viewed in various ways - yearly, monthly, weekly, daily and list view. To login and download click <a href="http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/05/new-version-357-of-apphp-calendar-has.html">here</a>;

The new version 2.4.3 of ApPHP DataGrid Wizard has been rele

http://phpbuilder.blogspot.com/2012/05/he-new-version-243-of-apphp-datagrid.html

The new version 2.4.3 of ApPHP DataGrid Wizard is available for downloading now from <a href="http://www.apphp.com/php-datagrid-wizard/index.php">here</a>. ApPHP DataGrid Wizard - is the utility script for generating of PHP DataGrid pages. ApPHP DataGrid Wizard allows you easy creation of DataGrid pages. This operation does not require specific technical or programming knowledge. All you need is to select a table, fields for the table, define the data type for each field and choose any other setting you need... In a few seconds you will get page with powerful and fully functional DataGrid component.
